pos_mean_info_list.mean: 知识分子；凭理智做事者
可理解的；明了的；仅能用智力了解的
智力；情报工作；情报机关；理解力
智力，理解力；知识分子；思维逻辑领悟力；智力高的人

word_mean_info__list.difference: 正式用词，指在理解新的、抽象东西或处理解决问题时，智力超过一般常人。
口语常用词，多指年轻人，尤指小孩思路敏捷，理解力强，机灵等。
侧重不是一般的聪明伶俐，而是有远见，有智慧，能明智地处理问题。
指思路敏捷，并暗示有创造与发明的才能和技巧。
指人的才华出众，思路敏捷，常令人赞叹不已。
强调头脑灵活，接受新事物快，有智有谋，但不一定暗示全面妥当地考虑问题。
普通用词，与bright和clever的意思很相近，但更强调机灵。
指精明老练，有头脑，善于判断，把握有利机会。

bilingual.source: Intelligent with new thoughts and high intelligence.
bilingual.target: 一批具有新思想、高智能的人才。

bilingual.source: It shows a true thoughtful and intelligent nature .
bilingual.target: 它显示了真正的思想与智能的本质。

bilingual.source: The origin of the species is due to intelligent design.
bilingual.target: 物种的起源是出于智能的设计.

bilingual.source: It is intelligent file search solution for home and business.
bilingual.target: 这是智能的文件搜索解决方案，为家庭和企业。

bilingual.source: AI must also learn and adapt to be considered intelligent.
bilingual.target: 人工智能还必须能学习和适应才能被认为是智能的。

bilingual.source: Intelligent somewhat arboreal ape of equatorial african forests.
bilingual.target: 赤道附近的非洲森林中有些智能的树栖类人猿。

bilingual.source: A horse is an intelligent vehicle, but it's only intelligent at certain things.
bilingual.target: 其中，马就相当于一台智能的飞行器，但它只对有限的行为和事物拥有智能。

bilingual.source: There is room for intelligent speculation as well as detailed analysis.
bilingual.target: 有空间智能的投机活动，以及详细的分析。

bilingual.source: Sabre Cats are a race of bipedal, intelligent beings with many feline features.
bilingual.target: 剑猫是一个种族的bipedal, 智能的人与许多猫的特点.

bilingual.source: The artificially intelligent cyborg has an acutely sarcastic sense of humor.
bilingual.target: 人工智能的电子人具有尖锐的讽刺幽默感。

yingyinNormal.zh: 这么说她很聪明喽？对一个恐龙来说是那样。

yingyinNormal.en: You're an attractive, intelligent woman and let's face it, Mike's kind of a wimp.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是一个迷人的，聪明的女人，让我们面对这些，麦克简直有点混蛋。

yingyinNormal.en: We were once a peaceful race of intelligent mechanical beings, but then came the war.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们曾是一群崇尚和平的智能机器人，但是却发生了战争。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait. Was this a small Mediterranean guy with curiously intelligent good looks? Yeah, that sounds about right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是不是那个矮小的地中海人，一幅聪明样的帅哥？对，应该就是他。

yingyinNormal.en: Imagine that one, a fraction of the size, deadly, intelligent, able to hide from the most advanced military technology.
yingyinNormal.zh: 试想一下，这只恐龙，有体型，又致命，还聪明，能躲过最先进的军队科技。

yingyinNormal.en: Let's see here. Oh, seriously though, Howard, you're actually one of the most intelligent people I know. And that's a zinger, because you're not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看看下面这个，不过话说回来，霍华德，你其实是我认识的最聪明的人之一，这是笑点，因为你不是。

yingyinNormal.en: For example, you're adorable, intelligent and a good earner. I could conservatively see you going for at least two oxen and a goose. You would fetch a unicorn.
yingyinNormal.zh: 比如，如果你长得标致，聪明伶俐又会挣钱，保守地说，你也能得到至少两头牛和一只鹅，而你，绝对能收到一头独角兽。

yingyinNormal.en: Compared to what? The idea that you're the only intelligent species, on the only inhabitable planet in a universe so full of planets that you don't even have a number to describe how many there are?
yingyinNormal.zh: 与什么相比？尤其是当宇宙中充满无数行星，数量多到在你们的世界都没有单位可以描述。

yingyinNormal.en: The anthropic principle states that if we wish to explain why our universe exists the way it does, the answer is that it must have qualities that allow intelligent creatures to arise who are capable of asking the question. As I am doing so eloquently right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人择原理指出如果我们想解释为何宇宙是我们看到的这种样子，那会是因为它必须像现在这样演化出能问出这道问题的智慧生物，才会有这个问题的出现，而我现在就正问着这问题呢。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: We think of it simply as a healthy and helpful flow of <highlight>intelligent</highlight> thought.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们简单地认为它是一种健康有益的智慧思维流。

sense_info_list.en: (of a device, machine or building) able to vary its state in response to varying situations

examination_example.sentence: To put it another way: How can we make sure that the thinking of <highlight>intelligent</highlight> machines reflects humanity's highest values?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 换句话说：我们如何确保智能机器的思维反映了人类的最高价值观？

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

examination_example.sentence: Although humans are more advanced and <highlight>intelligent</highlight>, animals are more genuine and authentic in their behavior and responses than human beings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然人类更高级，更聪明，但动物的行为和反应比人类更真实可信。

examination_example.sentence: Employers are looking for candidates that are <highlight>intelligent</highlight> and can quickly adapt and excel in a growing company.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 雇主们正在寻找聪明、能够快速适应并在成长中的公司脱颖而出的候选人。

examination_example.sentence: But the simplest thing cannot be made clear to the most <highlight>intelligent</highlight> man if he is firmly persuaded that he knows already.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，如果一个最聪明的人坚信他已经知道了，那么最简单的事情也不可能被他弄清楚。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 口语常用词, 多指年轻人, 尤指小孩思路敏捷, 理解力强, 机灵等。
指人的才华出众, 思路敏捷, 常令人赞叹不已。
强调头脑灵活, 接受新事物快, 有智有谋, 但不一定暗示全面妥当地考虑问题。
指思路敏捷, 并暗示有创造与发明的才能和技巧。
正式用词, 指在理解新的、抽象东西或处理解决问题时, 智力超过一般常人。

word_family.mean: adj. 有智力的；有才智的；智能的

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) having or showing intelligence; especially a high level

examination_example.sentence: For example, you might recognize that you are <highlight>intelligent</highlight>, but realize that you are not a genius.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，你可能认识到自己很聪明，但意识到自己不是天才。

examination_example.sentence: They are as <highlight>intelligent</highlight> as other children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们和其他孩子一样聪明。

examination_example.sentence: Some studies have found that first-born children are more <highlight>intelligent</highlight> than their later-born siblings (兄弟姐妹) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有研究发现，最先出生的孩子要比后来出生的弟弟妹妹们更聪明。

sense_info_list.en: (of a device; machine or building) able to vary its state in response to varying situations

examination_example.sentence: Professor Shook Godel of Georgia Tech developed an sacrificially <highlight>intelligent</highlight> teaching assistant to help handle enormous number of student questions in the online class, Knowledge Based Artificial Intelligence.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 佐治亚理工学院的肖克·戈德尔教授开发了一种人工智能教学助手，来帮助处理“基于人工智能的知识”这门网课中大量的学生提问。

examination_example.sentence: Teaching ethics to a machine even more <highlight>intelligent</highlight> than we are will be the bigger challenge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将伦理道德教给一台甚至比我们更智能的机器，将是更大的挑战。

指人的才华出众，思路敏捷，常令人赞叹不已。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 才智；智力；情报工作；谍报工作；情报；消息；谍报；智慧生命；智者；谍报人员

word_family.mean: adj. 有智力的；有才智的；智能的

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) having or showing intelligence, especially a high level

examination_example.sentence: Being emotionally <highlight>intelligent</highlight> does not necessarily make one a moral person.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 情感上智慧并不一定能使人成为一个有道德的人。

examination_example.sentence: Why is it that some people are so much more <highlight>intelligent</highlight> or creative than the rest of us?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么有些人比我们其他人更聪明或更有创造力？

sense_info_list.en: (of a device, machine or building) able to vary its state in response to varying situations

examination_example.sentence: These include custom-made navigation (导航) tools, night vision systems and <highlight>intelligent</highlight> speed adaptations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中包括定制导航工具、夜视系统和智能速度自适应。
